quests.title: Smile at a stranger
quests.description: A simple moment of human recognition.

quests.title: Say thank you and mean it
quests.description: Offer a sincere expression of gratitude.

quests.title: Hold a door open
quests.description: Pause for a moment to make someone's path easier.

quests.title: Let someone merge in traffic
quests.description: Create a small pocket of patience on the road.

quests.title: Give a genuine compliment
quests.description: Notice something real and kind about someone.

quests.title: Remember someone's name
quests.description: Show that you care enough to remember.

quests.title: Ask someone how they're doing (and listen)
quests.description: Offer your attention without rushing the answer.

quests.title: Pick up litter you didn't create
quests.description: Leave a space better than you found it.

quests.title: Return a shopping cart
quests.description: A small act of responsibility in a shared space.

quests.title: Be on time today
quests.description: Respect your own time and others' time.

quests.title: Put your phone away during a conversation
quests.description: Give someone your full attention.

quests.title: Apologize when you're wrong
quests.description: Own a mistake with honesty and care.

quests.title: Leave a kind comment online
quests.description: Add a little warmth to someone's notifications.

quests.title: Don't engage in an argument you could escalate
quests.description: Choose peace over being "right" on the internet.

quests.title: Share helpful information without dunking
quests.description: Offer clarity without shaming anyone.

quests.title: Credit an original creator
quests.description: Acknowledge whose work you're benefiting from.

quests.title: Check in on a friend unprompted
quests.description: Reach out just to say you care.

quests.title: Write a thank-you message
quests.description: Tell someone how they've impacted you.

quests.title: Forgive someone (internally)
quests.description: Let go a little, even if they never know.

quests.title: Offer help without being asked
quests.description: Notice a need and gently step in.

quests.title: Reconnect with someone you lost touch with
quests.description: Send a small, kind message to reopen a door.

quests.title: Help a neighbor with something practical
quests.description: Lighten a nearby load in a tangible way.

quests.title: Donate unused items
quests.description: Pass along what you no longer need to someone who does.

quests.title: Support a local business intentionally
quests.description: Choose to keep your support close to home.

quests.title: Attend a community meeting or event
quests.description: Show up where your community gathers.

quests.title: Help someone learn a skill
quests.description: Share what you know with patience.

quests.title: Reduce single-use plastic for a week
quests.description: Experiment with a gentler footprint.

quests.title: Plant something
quests.description: Add a small piece of green to the world.

quests.title: Learn about local environmental issues
quests.description: Understand what your area is facing.

quests.title: Participate in a cleanup
quests.description: Join others in caring for a shared space.

quests.title: Learn about an issue you don't fully understand
quests.description: Let curiosity guide you into nuance.

quests.title: Read a perspective you disagree with
quests.description: Listen without needing to win.

quests.title: Practice patience in a stressful moment
quests.description: Notice the tension and soften your response.

quests.title: Volunteer with a local organization
quests.description: Offer your time where it's needed nearby.

quests.title: Volunteer for disaster relief
quests.description: Support people facing urgent hardship.

quests.title: Commit to recurring volunteer work
quests.description: Show up consistently for a cause you care about.

quests.title: Organize a community event
quests.description: Gather people around something that matters.

quests.title: Start a local fundraiser
quests.description: Help direct resources toward a need.

quests.title: Coordinate a donation drive
quests.description: Connect donors with organizations that can use their help.

quests.title: Mentor someone long-term
quests.description: Invest in someone's growth over time.

quests.title: Register to vote (if applicable)
quests.description: Prepare yourself to participate in civic decisions.

quests.title: Help someone else register
quests.description: Make civic participation a bit easier for someone else.

quests.title: Contact a representative about an issue
quests.description: Share your perspective with someone in office.

quests.title: Attend a town hall
quests.description: Be present where decisions are discussed.

quests.title: Start or help maintain a community garden
quests.description: Grow something that others can benefit from.

quests.title: Advocate for a local environmental cause
quests.description: Use your voice for a healthier place to live.

quests.title: Reduce personal waste long-term
quests.description: Design habits that gently shrink your footprint.
